thread.title: TV actress Mitali Nag looks beautiful as she poses with her baby boy! (View picture)
thread.title_full: TV actress Mitali Nag looks beautiful as she poses with her baby boy! (View picture)

author: Zainab Mulla
title: TV actress Mitali Nag looks beautiful as she poses with her baby boy! (View picture)
text:
TV actress Mitali Nag looks beautiful as she poses with her baby boy! (View picture) Mitali even shared a picture on her Instagram, where she is seen holding her little boy. By Zainab Mulla | Published:  18 AM IST Comments 
Popular telly actress Mitali Nag who is quite well-known for her role Afsar Bitiya in Zee TV show is in a happy zone these days as she recently gave birth to a baby boy on January 4, 2017. Yes, Mitali even shared a picture on her Instagram, where she is seen holding her little boy. She even captioned the photograph as, “New Mommy in town…!!!” Mitali and Sankalpp welcomed their adorable baby boy in Milatli’s hometown in Nagpur and named him Rudranssh, isn’t that sounds magical? The two have been in a long-term relationship and met at a BPO, where Sankalpp worked as a manager. Later on the actress finally tied the knot with interior designer Sankalpp Pardeshi in Nagpur on November 10, 2014. 
While talking to Dainik Bhaskar, Mitali said, “As a woman this is the best phase of my life. I am promoted to being a Mother. God has been kind. Junior Pardeshi has brought a new light in our life and I am sure he will make us proud.” Later on even Mitali’s husband and the new daddy in the town said, “I was there inside the delivery room and have cut the cord. Turning into a father from a man is a great experience. I am all over the moon. We have yet not thought of any name for him, but we will finalize soon.” Have a look at the picture – A post shared by мiταli иαg (@mitali_nag) on Feb 23, 2017 at 9:49am PST 
A post shared by мiταli иαg (@mitali_nag) on Feb 14, 2017 at 5:14am PST A post shared by мiταli иαg (@mitali_nag) on Feb 14, 2017 at 5:13am PST
